      • OnPDFPosChanged

        public void OnPDFPosChanged(PDFView.PDFPos pos)
        Description copied from interface: PDFView.PDFViewListener
        fired when position changed.
        Specified by:
        OnPDFPosChanged in interface PDFView.PDFViewListener
        Parameters:
        pos - position in PDF coordinate.
        mostly you can do something with pos:
        --use vGetPage(pos.pageno) to get more details and do coordinate conversion.
        --determine whether pageno has changed.
        --enumerate all displayed pages by check coordinates.
